name: ParameterDiffTest
description: Test suite for comparing differences in parameters between different OpenAPI specifications.

test_cases.name: testDiffDifferent
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints between two different parameter files.

test_cases.name: issue458MaximumDecreased
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the maximum value of an integer parameter is decreased.

test_cases.name: issue458MaximumIncreased
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the maximum value of an integer parameter is increased.

test_cases.name: issue458MinimumDecreased
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the minimum value of an integer parameter is decreased.

test_cases.name: issue458MinimumIncreased
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the minimum value of an integer parameter is increased.

test_cases.name: issue458IntegerFormatChanged
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the format of an integer parameter is changed.

test_cases.name: issue458ExclusiveMinimumChanged
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the exclusive minimum value of an integer parameter is changed.

test_cases.name: issue458ExclusiveMaximumChanged
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the exclusive maximum value of an integer parameter is changed.

test_cases.name: issue458ExclusiveMinimumRemoved
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the exclusive minimum value of an integer parameter is removed.

test_cases.name: issue458ExclusiveMaximumRemoved
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the exclusive maximum value of an integer parameter is removed.

test_cases.name: issue458ExclusiveMaximumTrueToFalse
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the exclusive maximum value of an integer parameter is changed from true to false.

test_cases.name: issue458ExclusiveMinimumTrueToFalse
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the exclusive minimum value of an integer parameter is changed from true to false.

test_cases.name: issue458ExclusiveMaximumTrueRemoved
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the exclusive maximum value of an integer parameter is removed while it was true.

test_cases.name: issue458ExclusiveMinimumTrueRemoved
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when the exclusive minimum value of an integer parameter is removed while it was true.

test_cases.name: issue488RenameParameterAddAndRemoveParameterReturnFalse
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI endpoints when a parameter is renamed, added, and removed, expecting a false return.
